channel.title: Im new here
channel.description:
Hi im new here so i have a few question about some morascape stuff.I read the stickies but they seem cunfusing so ill ask here. Im new to morascape so plz note i dont no much
1.Whenn i want a item like a dragon chain body were do i type in the code i no what the code is but were do i type it in and how.
2.When i try to tele to fally it wont let me and at the watch tower it wont let me climb the ladder down.
3.Were can i find the list to other peoples servers.
That mostly it plz reply :confused: :confused:

item.title: Im new here
item.dc:creator: @apoco apoco
item.description:
@apoco wrote:

i can help with 2 things ok if u want items then u go to help and then item ids and find it like type in chain for the dragon chain mail then in the game text box put in ::pickup The number u found and then 1

u can find a list of other peopls servers by going to mopaarscape.org and then go to server status page

Read full topic

item.title: Im new here
item.dc:creator: @Genjoi Genjoi
item.description:
@Genjoi wrote:

Hello and welcome to moparscape. For your first question to pickup a dragon chain body type in ::pickup 3140. The second one when you play hybridscape it has tons of bugs involved in it like fury/fire cape crash’s the server so don’t really play on that. For your third question please visit Rs2 Server Advertisement for other peoples servers. Hope this helps, and enjoy moparscape.

~Genjoi

Read full topic
